Headline: 63rd-bound Green and Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
